overview_of_class: Axiomatic approach to the real number system. Sequences of real numbers and basic properties of limits of sequences. Real-valued functions of one variable; continuity and uniform continuity. Basic properties of differentiable functions. Construction of the Riemann integral and its basic properties.
name: Real Analysis
subject: MATH
